events
Interface Event

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttackEvent, BuyEvent, CastEvent, DefendEvent, DisconnectEvent, EquipEvent, GladdosEvent, MoveEvent, NewClientEvent, OpenEvent, SellEvent, TeleportEvent, UndefendEvent
public interface Event

The game engine's interface for a general event. It is to be implemented by a specific game implementation.

Author:
Ryan

Method Summary
 GladdosUpdate execute(ServerWorldState serverWorldState)
          Each event will have a different implementation of this method in order to modify the world state in different ways.
 

Method Detail

execute

GladdosUpdate execute(ServerWorldState serverWorldState)
Each event will have a different implementation of this method in order to modify the world state in different ways.

Parameters:
serverWorldState - The serverWorldState to modify.
Returns:
A GladdosUpdate object that reflects this change that will be broadcasted to all connected clients.
